DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate impact provide high protein supplementation form medical food bar contain 20grams protein eath hypoalbuminemic dialysis patient .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Providing High Protein Bar Dialysis Patients With Low Serum Albumin
DOC.criteria: Subjects ESRD undergo center hemodialysis peritoneal dialysis 90 day . 18 year age old . Must reasonable expectation remain treatment least 3 month . Must average serum albumin < 3.5 g/dL three month prior entry study . Must able understand sign inform consent . Must willing able participate nutrition interview determination nutrient intake conventional food . Allergy protein , milk , nuts wheat . Documented ongoing acute infection inflammatory process include treatment antibiotic within two week time study entry . Severe acidosis define predialysis serum bicarbonate level < 15 mEq/L . Presence condition would affect normal response repletion protein calorie , gastrointestinal disorder include inflammatory bowel disease . Hospitalization infectious condition within 4 week prior study entry . Planned surgery within three month study period include plan kidney transplantation .
